documents.document: #EliminationChamber - That sounds like something #Trump , in his Orwellian #doublethink way, might suggest for 'humane" refugee disposal!
@slowitchriot I too wait for the night. There is a semblance of peace in the darkness. A little safer, for a while,although it doesn't last.
@slowitchriot I see exactly what you need to be distracted from, oh poor autodidactic one!
I have completely lost faith in the New Zealand medical profession, Doctors, surgeons, all.
Sometimes, when one is extremely, visibly ill, people choose not to notice, or worse, look away.
@PeterAlexander One way or t'other, whether through taxes on Mexican imports or taxing money sent from the U.S. to relatives, they WILL pay!
@jsrnz Sad, but true. It's a wicked , Orwellian world we live in. Hitler clones are everywhere, not to sidetrack discussion!
Life goes from bad to worse. House inspection tomorrow. Work site down. Amazingly sick.What next? 1) Eviction. 2) Getting fired. 3) Death.
#Orwell 's #Doublethink: Alternative Facts. Fake news. Extreme vetting.
"War is peace.Freedom is slavery.Ignorance is strength." And any contradiction of the Party line is blasphemy. Is this 2017 or 1984?
#FireWalkWithMe #TwinPeaks I am watching Laura Palmer lurch screaming towards her death. Without sounding overly dramatic, I empathise.
#TwinPeaks However: Laura Palmer said: I will return in 25 years." Not sure if that season is available in NZ yet. I wait with bated breath.
I must admit that I found the ending to #TwinPeaks S.2 disappointing. When there was 1 there are 2.Doppelgangers. Coop possessed by Bob So?
I am reading #BernardSumner 's #ChapterAndVerse - his view on #JoyDivision & #NewOrder - quite illuminating, & very nicely written.
Thinking of #JohnHurt reminds me that I must watch #TheNakedCivilServant , an oft forgotten gem ##HurrahForQuentinCrisp A great actor lost..
Haven't a hope of getting my huge workload completed on DEADline,but I will NOT to do an #IanCurtis (So messy for others to find!) #OhPoorMe
Although I feel great despair at the fact that my workplace's Australian-based server is still down & incommunicado,I will try to calm down.
@ArbyHyde Regarding being a small retailer: as a gesture of solidarity, I shall severely curtail any & all online shopping. (Not joking!)
@ArbyHyde My heart really goes out to you, It must be near impossible to be a small retailer these days.
@JohnKeyMustGo Basically, I think that the PC lot are brainwashed idiots afraid to think for themselves anymore!
I am totally sympathetic towards #LaResistance and protesting when matters are horribly WRONG in society. But deaf ears, I fear #IdiotTrump
#Trump "Extreme vetting" - more Orwell-Speak Are refugees and immigrants terminally ill animals to be 'put down' on a despot's whim?
I like @ArrestJK 's tweet: "To talk to a man who has renounced the use of reason is like trying to administer medicine to the dead."
Oh, I despair when I see the so right wing he's fascist #Trump 's dreadful progress in this Orwwellian horror show.Putin,May-so predictable.
@ArrestJK I do like your use of Thomas Paine in regard to trolls,but why does his statement also remind me of Trump?Sorry if you support IT!
Oh, poor #JohnHurt. Cancer, and dead at only 77. The Elephant Man, Caligula - a great, moving, acting talent. I am sad. RIP.
@SecretChimp I know. the wretched thing is that emails are not being answered, & there's no emergency mobile no. Deadline looming!
@SecretChimp Oh,it's Auckland Anniversary here.The company I work for is based in Auckland,and they have disappeared - not answering emails.
Oh God, the work server has gone down again, & I can' contact anyone by email or phone as it is a holiday weekend.IT people in Australia...
Vive la #resistance ; ANY protest is vital to democracy, but I truly despair of its efficacy in the face of such dreadful intransigence.
I have been binge watching the magical #TwinPeaks to escape from my miserable, pain-racked body (Thank you #DavidLynch !). 1 episode left...
I think of the '60's Civil Rights marches , Womens Rights in the '70's, Gay Rights,N.Z.'s Anti-Nuclear fight...But is protest useless today?
It's true #Trump 's dangerous rhetoric has no place in the 21st century,but I fear all protest is useless when faced with intransigence .
Do you realise that Mexicans may end up paying for the ludicrous #Wall through taxes on any money sent from the USA to Mexico? #sayImwrong !
When I think of all the condescending creeps who've said they are praying for me over the years,I wish I'd had the guts to slap their faces.
#Trump should be an exhibit in some zoo: The Slimy Rat Bastard Americanus. Do not feed.
I think that I shall have to go away for a while; the pain is too bad. Wait for me, wait for me.
I really don't know where my voice comes from, when the rest of me is so fucked up. Words just come out, & I hope that they're not obscene.
@JulianLennon Alternate facts... We really do live in an Orwellian world!
@lsherrington1 OH Louise, the film is UNSPEAKABLY worse! I really don't know what possessed me to watch the wretched thing!
@kurtlonerboy Yes,Outside is unspeakable & out of the question.Well, I could always start using Grinder...No, that would only end in tears!
@drk_jonathan But that is a GOOD skill, Jonathan! After many years, I still both look at the keyboard, & use two fingers to peck at it.
In my quest to find an interesting person,I will: a)Like randoms on Facebook b)Send them an intellect-flattering message. c)Go outside.(No!)
For some reason, I watched 50 Shades Of Stupid.Oh, dear. Anna: "You have no right to be mad!" Christian: "But I AM mad! HOGTWISTINGLY mad!"
@SecretChimp Special Agent Denise Bryson does scrub up well, but as President of the Wellington Manly Mens 'Knitting' Club, I AM OFFENDED!
@kurtlonerboy Thank you, sweetheart!
@kurtlonerboy Do you remember Anton's Ian portraits for Atmosphere?Tony Wilson asked the band to send them to Factory. Stolen within a week!
@liIsIeepy Yep, I remember the Billy Bob tattoo. At least she didn't get a Brad tattoo...
@SheWhoVotes You are quite right. This particular beast thrives on attention and publicity!
@therealraywise Mr. Wise, I'm watching Twin Peaks again,and am still flabbergasted by your wonderful performance as Leland. You're the tops!
Civilisation dies when democracy & humanitarianism are discarded as irrelevant. Make war, not peace. Sell fucking jewellery. Go #Trump !
@kurtlonerboy What a beautiful photo of Ian Curtis! Anton Corbijn, or somebody else?
#TwinPeaks influences,Part 2! #TheTwilightZone , #ModSquad (the lovely Peggy Lipton),& #TheFugitive (one armed man, anyone? Probably more...
#TwinPeaks is entrancing. #DavidLynch used, in his unique way, #WestSideStory (Richard Beymer & Russ Tamblyn, playing against type...
My body has gone mad with pan. Madness, of the body or mind, is not, unfortunately, an exalted state conducive to creativity. It is agony.
Due to cowardice - I don't fancy being sliced open for the 3rd time - I am procrastinating about calling an ambulance.
@SecretChimp Yet another treat! Thank you, oh ever informative one!
Yet another reason to watch #TwinPeaks again is that it features both Russ Tamblyn & Richard Beymer from #WestSideStory #MyPersonalTrivia
God forbid musicians & other 'celebs' should have something interesting & personal to say online. Instead they peddle their tat & trivia.
When you're trying to talk yo a person ( #fleshdevice) interacting with some electronic device,there is a 10 second delay before they react.
I am sick of looking up potentially interesting musicians on Twitter, only to find that they are promoting their gigs, scribblings & daubs.
#Trump Today, although it is summer in New Zealand, I am wearing a warm hat, jacket and gloves. Helen has finally frozen over.
#Trump What times we live in!I am thrilled to see climate control & humanitarian issues wiped out,& Melania's jewellery line brought in!
#Trump Good Morning America, welcome to a brand new day! "Stand up, we'll put you on your feet again, President Gas is President Gas again."
A demented,deluded President Gas in power,infinitely worse than the horrid,also deranged Reagan Say hello to The Madness of King #Trump 1st!
"No lies, party time is here again President Gas is up for President"... #PsychedelicFurs Suddenly, so relevant.
The Psychedelic Furs - President Gas https://t.co/aPFaTJMT7o via @YouTube President Gas is President Gas again!
Infomercial: "Your first hour awake dictates how your whole day is going to go!" Me - 8pm: But when would that hour be, Ted?"
Can anyone tell me what kind of miserable musical nonentities #Trump found at the bottom of the barrel to perform at his stupid concert? Ta.
Hurrah for the #GreyPower group that wants to have #marijuana legalized. I would give ANYTHING for even the medical stuff. My pain is awful.
I love the sound of breaking trash! #UnReal is currently a guilty pleasures, satirising. as it does, the "wonderful' world of #TheBachelor
@DavidSug I guess that makes Trump the Great Bastard Pretender!
@itwaspunk I already own #CommercialZone2014 and it is one of my favorite pieces of music EVER - everyone else get their CD NOW!
@EdwardTHardy @EJLandwehr You see, Edward,the Martin Luther King weekend wasn't actually about the odious Trump.Why the hell should it care?
@EJLandwehr @realDonaldTrump Eric, you are a gentleman after my own heart!
@Opdiner You don't know how lucky you are, son...
@KAmorphous As I watch, dazed and horrified, from New Zealand, I can only imagine what it feels like to be an American now!
@realelliottgrif Hey Elliott, I know that you're talking about #Sherlock , but I've just seen #TheImitationGame - such an immense talent!
@Roxy_Cinema More power to you, @Roxy_Cinema ! What an outrageously wonderful selection of films you play!
#Trump If the orange fool blasts you on Twitter, it's a sure sign that you're doing something right!
Gee whiz. #Trump blasts Saturday Night Live as "really bad television." This comes from Mr. #CelebrityApprentice !
@GeorgeTakei @Shakespeare527 I think it's a true symbol of one's integrity when Trump comes after you on Twitter!
@JimJarmusch #AlanVega , Rock n' Roll #Suicide , a legend forever. I too am very sad to hear of his death. RIP, if there is such a thing.
@sam_kriss @Gixibyte Oh Sam - What do you do when the confused say socialism and communism (in the '50's witch hunt sense) are the same?
@GeorgeTakei George, in New Zealand we call it 3 a.m. shit posting; all sound and fury signifying nada!
@MickJagger Hey Mick, I did enjoy #Vinyl . Any more collaborations with Scorcese (or anyone else) planned?
@WilkowMajority @Buster3PointO Well yes, especially when one considers the American usage of the word 'punk'!
@BusterPoindextr @TheRoxyHotelNYC Are you the real David, Buster, or some horrid imposter? #NewYorkDollsForever
@EJLandwehr @realDonaldTrump Trump, you are a despicable creature, and Erik, I join you declaring eternal enmity, far away in New Zealand!
@SecretChimp I remember your natural habitat is #Melbourne, food capital of the world. Do you (despite butter, salt)indulge at restaurants?
#TheImitationGame is such a good film that I am going to read #AlanHodges book (that inspired the movie) although I am NOT a mathematician!
#BenedictCummerbatch (Sp.?) turned in such a brilliant & sensitive performance as #AlanTuring in #TheIImitationGame #EnigmaCode . Genius!
@itwaspunk Well Keith, I would if I could, but I live in New Zealand! #DigitalArtGeniusOfExceptionalIntellectualAbilityBoy !
@SecretChimp WHAT? But salt is the most important part of any foodstuff to me! #HereticLicoriceFiend #DoomedSaltFreak
I've done no work today, I've done NO WORK! But it doesn't matter; #Twitter is MUCH more important than holding down a job...
Re. my new #DennisPotter box set: #TheSingingDetective , #PenniesFromHeaven - bloody weeks of wonderful entertainment! #PerceptiveChildOMine
I was just thinking that I have outstayed my welcome on earth by at least 3 years,when my dear son gave me a #DennisPotter box set #TrueHero
#AlexJones #AmericanNut Apparently, all the chemicals in froggy waters are turning frogs gay! #HurrahForGayFrogs
#Nutella Every year, more & more people become allergic to Nuts. When Nuts finally figure this out, we are fucked. #EvilNutAttack
#Licorice , especially the salted variety, may not yet be deemed harmful to your health, but it is frightfully addictive #LicoriceJunkieBoy
